name: Mashin' Mages
description:
Once upon a time, four wizards each bragged about who was the strongest in the kingdom. To determine the winner, they organized a tournament. The winner is the one who successfully bewitch the king's knight .

Contains an executable, instruction booklet and card template!

Created by Digital Deer:

-Thomas Bégin (Programming, Game Mechanics)

-Maxime Lacasse-Germain (2D Artist, Game Interfaces, Graphic Design)

-Linna Lim (2D Artist, Game Interfaces, Special Effects)

-Mathieu Malette (Project Management, Sound Direction, Special Effects, QA)

All the graphical assets and most of the audio assets (some were free of rights and altered by the team) were created by Digital Deer during the Montreal Joue Game Jam.
